amendment.description: To provide exemptions from requirements for certain farm vehicles.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1814 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1814 proposed by Senator Merkley. (consideration: CR S1602-1603) To provide exemptions from requirements for certain farm vehicles.
